name: XCTMeasureOptions
desc: Options to control the gathering of performance measurements during tests.

items.name: var invocationOptions: XCTMeasureOptions.InvocationOptions
items.desc: Options that define whether measurement is automatically or manually controlled.

items.name: struct XCTMeasureOptions.InvocationOptions
items.desc: Test measurement options that control how measurement starts and stops.

items.name: var iterationCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the performance test measures its block.
